DECK.  205. SURVEY NUMBER
BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.
FORM.  1. S-205U - UNITED STATES FORM 2. S-205E - EUROPEAN THEATER OF OPERATIONS FORM 3. S-20XX - CENTRAL PACIFIC BASE COMMAND FORM 4. S-205I - CHINA-INDIA-BURMA FORM
Q.1. WHAT IS YOUR RANK OR GRADE*  1. PRIVATE 2. PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 3. CORPORAL OR TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE 4. SERGEANT (ANY GRADE) OR TECHNICIAN 3RD OR 4TH GRADE 0. NO ANSWER

Q.2. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARMY* E. IF YOU HAVE SERVED PREVIOUSLY IN THE ARMY, GIVE THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOU ENTERED THIS LAST TIME. IF YOU WERE A NATIONAL GUARDSMAN GIVE THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOUR OUTFIT ENTERED THE ARMY.  ANP (ACTUAL NUMBER MONTHS) 07. 7 MONTHS . . . 99. 99 MONTHS OR MORE 97.NO ANSWER 00.NO CODE OR NO DATA
Q.3. HAVE YOU BEEN IN ACTUAL COMBAT IN THIS WAR*  1. YES, I HAVE BEEN IN ACTUAL COMBAT 2. YES, I HAVE BEEN UNDER ENEMY FIRE, BUT NOT IN ACTUAL COMBAT 3. NO 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.4. ARE YOU ENTITLED TO WEAR ANY CAMPAIGN STARS* IF YES, HOW MANY*  01. YES, ONE CAMPAIGN STAR 02. YES, TWO CAMPAIGN STARS 03. YES, THREE CAMPAIGN STARS 04. YES, FOUR CAMPAIGN STARS 05. YES, FIVE CAMPAIGN STARS OR ONE SILVER CAMPAIGN STAR (A SILVER CAMPAIGN COUNTS AS FIVE CAMPAIGN STARS) 06. YES, SIX CAMPAIGN STARS 07. YES, SEVEN CAMPAIGN STARS 08. YES, EIGHT CAMPAIGN STARS 09. YES, NINE OR MORE CAMPAIGN STARS 10. YES, NO ANSWER 11. NO 00. NO ANSWER

Q.5. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING DECORATIONS OR AWARDS DO YOU HAVE* (DISTINGUISHED-SERVICE CROSS, LEGION OF MERIT, SILVER STAR, DISTINGUISHED-FLYING CROSS, SOLDIER,S MEDAL, BRONZE STAR MEDAL (NOT CAMPAIGN STAR), AIR MEDAL, PURPLE HEART) Z. COUNT EACH STAR, AWARD, AND OAK LEAF CLUSTER SEPARATELY AND CODE THE TOTAL.  ANP (TOTAL NUMBER) 01. TOTAL OF ONE . . . 40. TOTAL OF FORTY 98.I DON,T HAVE ANY AWARDS OR DECORATIONS 99.NO ANSWER 00.NO CODE OR NO DATA
Q.6. ARE YOU:  1. SINGLE 2. MARRIED 3. WIDOWED, DIVORCED, OR SEPARATED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.7. HAVE YOU ANY CHILDREN UNDER 18 YEARS OF AGE* IF YES, HOW MANY*  1. YES, ONE CHILD 2. YES, TWO CHILDREN 3. YES, THREE CHILDREN 4. YES, FOUR OR MORE CHILDREN 5. YES, HOW MANY NOT SPECIFIED 6. NO 7. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.8. WHAT BRANCH OF THE ARMY ARE YOU IN NOW*  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED (TANKS) 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY 09. ANTI-AIRCRAFT 10. AIR CORPS 11. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 12. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 13. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 14. MILITARY POLICE 15. TANK DESTROYER 16. OTHER 00. NO ANSWER

Q.9. HOW CLEAR AN IDEA DO YOU HAVE OF WHY WE ARE FIGHTING THIS WAR*  1. I HAVE A VERY CLEAR IDEA 2. I HAVE A FAIRLY CLEAR IDEA 3. I AM NOT SO CLEAR 4. I AM NOT AT ALL CLEAR 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
Q.10. DO YOU EVER GET THE FEELING THAT THIS WAR IS NOT WORTH FIGHTING*  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ONLY ONCE IN A GREAT WHILE 4. NEVER 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.11. IN GENERAL, HOW WOULD YOU SAY YOU FEEL MOST OF THE TIME, IN GOOD SPIRITS OR IN LOW SPIRITS*  1. I AM USUALLY IN GOOD SPIRITS 2. I AM IN GOOD SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME AND IN LOW SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME 3. I AM USUALLY IN LOW SPIRITS 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.12. CONSIDERING EVERYTHING, HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT FURTHER SERVICE IN THE ARMY*  1. I SHOULD BE DISCHARGED NOW 2. I SHOULD SERVE A WHILE LONGER, BUT I SHOULD NOT HAVE TO STAY IN UNTIL JAPAN IS DEFEATED 3. I SHOULD BE DISCHARGED AS SOON AFTER JAPAN IS DEFEATED AS IS POSSIBLE 4. I WANT TO REMAIN IN THE ARMY AFTER THE WAR 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 13 AND 14 CODED TOGETHER.

Q.13. HOW GOOD DO YOU THINK YOUR CHANCES ARE OF BEING DISCHARGED FROM THE ARMY BEFORE THE WAR WITH JAPAN IS OVER*  Q.14. WHAT ARE THE REASONS FOR YOUR ANSWER TO QUESTION 13*  1. VERY GOOD CHANCE 2. FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE 3. NOT MUCH OF A CHANCE 4. NO CHANCE AT ALL 5. VERY GOOD OR FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE (MEDICAL REASON GIVEN IN QUESTION 14) 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.15. WHAT IS YOUR BEST GUESS AS TO HOW MUCH LONGER YOU WILL BE IN THE ARMY BEFORE YOU ARE DISCHARGED*  1. LESS THAN 3 MONTHS 2. 3 MONTHS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 6 MONTHS 3. 6 MONTHS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 1 YEAR 4. 1 YEAR UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 1 1/2 YEARS 5. 1 1/2 YEARS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 2 YEARS 6. 2 YEARS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 3 YEARS 7. 3 YEARS OR MORE 8. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.16. COMPARED WITH OTHER PEOPLE, HOW GOOD DO YOU THINK YOUR CHANCES WILL BE OF GETTING THE KIND OF JOB YOU WANT BY THE TIME YOU GET OUT OF THE ARMY*  1. MY CHANCES WILL BE BETTER THAN MOST PEOPLE,S 2. MY CHANCES WILL BE ABOUT THE SAME AS MOST PEOPLE,S 3. MY CHANCES WILL BE WORSE THAN MOST PEOPLE,S 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.17. IF THE JAPS OFFERED TO STOP FIGHTING NOW AND TRY TO WORK OUT A PEACE IN WHICH BOTH SIDES WOULD HAVE SOMETHING TO SAY ABOUT THE PEACE TERMS, WHICH OF THESE DO YOU THINK WE SHOULD DO*  1. WE SHOULD KEEP ON FIGHTING UNTIL THEY ARE COMPLETELY BEATEN 2. WE SHOULD STOP AND TRY TO WORK OUT PEACE TERMS WITH THE JAPS NOW 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.18. HOW DO YOU SIZE UP THE WAR AHEAD IN THE PACIFIC - HAVE WE ALREADY DONE MOST OF THE JOB OR DO WE STILL HAVE THE HARDEST PART OF THE JOB AHEAD OF US*  1. WE HAVE ALREADY PRACTICALLY WON THE WAR AGAINST JAPAN 2. WE STILL HAVE A BIG JOB AHEAD, BUT IT SHOULDN,T BE SO VERY TOUGH 3. WE STILL HAVE TO FACE A HARD STRUGGLE IN WHICH AMERICA WILL SUFFER GREAT LOSSES IN MEN AND MATERIALS 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.19. WHAT IS YOUR GUESS AS TO HOW LONG IT WILL PROBABLY TAKE US TO BEAT JAPAN*  01. LESS THAN 6 MONTHS 02. 6 MONTHS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 1 YEAR 03. 1 YEAR UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 1 1/2 YEARS 04. 1 1/2 YEARS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 2 YEARS 05. 2 YEARS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 2 1/2 YEARS 06. 2 1/2 YEARS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 3 YEARS 07. 3 YEARS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 4 YEARS 08. 4 YEARS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 5 YEARS 09. 5 YEARS OR MORE 10. INDEFINITE OR INDETERMINATE 11. NO ANSWER 00. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.20. WHAT IS THE VERY LONGEST YOU THINK JAPAN MIGHT HOLD OUT AGAINST US*  01. LESS THAN 6 MONTHS 02. 6 MONTHS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 1 YEAR 03. 1 YEAR UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 1 1/2 YEARS 04. 1 1/2 YEARS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 2 YEARS 05. 2 YEARS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 2 1/2 YEARS 06. 2 1/2 YEARS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 3 YEARS 07. 3 YEARS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 4 YEARS 08. 4 YEARS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 5 YEARS 09. 5 YEARS OR MORE 10. INDEFINITE OR INDETERMINATE 11. NO ANSWER 00. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.21. DO YOU THINK JAPAN WILL GIVE UP AND SURRENDER ON OUR TERMS BEFORE THEY LOSE EVERYTHING, OR DO YOU THINK THEY WILL KEEP RIGHT ON FIGHTING TO THE VERY END*  1. THEY WILL GIVE UP AND SURRENDER 2. THEY WILL KEEP RIGHT ON FIGHTING TO THE VERY END 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.22. IN GENERAL, DO YOU FEEL YOU YOURSELF HAVE GOTTEN A SQUARE DEAL FROM THE ARMY*  1. YES, IN MOST WAYS I HAVE 2. IN SOME WAYS, YES, IN OTHERS, NO 3. NO, ON THE WHOLE I HAVE NOT GOTTEN A SQUARE DEAL 0. NO ANSWER P. HERE ARE SOME QUESTIONS ABOUT THE ARMY REDEPLOYMENT AND READJUSTMENT PLAN. THIS PLAN USES A POINT SYSTEM AND SCORE CARD TO HELP DECIDE WHO GOES HOME FIRST FROM OVERSEAS AND WHO GETS OUT OF THE ARMY FIRST. THE REASON FOR ASKING THESE QUESTIONS IS TO FIND OUT WHAT PARTS OF THE PLAN ARE UNDERSTOOD BY THE MEN IN THE ARMY AND WHAT PARTS THEY NEED TO KNOW MORE ABOUT.
Q.23A. NUMBER OF DAYS IN COMBAT*  1. YES, THIS WILL BE USED IN GIVING POINTS 2. NO, THIS WILL NOT BE USED IN GIVING POINTS 3. I DON,T KNOW WHAT THE ARMY PLANS TO DO 0. NO ANSWER
Q.23B. LENGTH OF TIME IN SERVICE*  1. YES, THIS WILL BE USED IN GIVING POINTS 2. NO, THIS WILL NOT BE USED IN GIVING POINTS 3. I DON,T KNOW WHAT THE ARMY PLANS TO DO 0. NO ANSWER
Q.23C. LENGTH OF TIME OVERSEAS*  1. YES, THIS WILL BE USED IN GIVING POINTS 2. NO, THIS WILL NOT BE USED IN GIVING POINTS 3. I DON,T KNOW WHAT THE ARMY PLANS TO DO 0. NO ANSWER
Q.23D. WIFE WITHOUT CHILDREN*  1. YES, THIS WILL BE USED IN GIVING POINTS 2. NO, THIS WILL NOT BE USED IN GIVING POINTS 3. I DON,T KNOW WHAT THE ARMY PLANS TO DO 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
Q.23E. CHILDREN UNDER 18 YEARS OF AGE*  1. YES, THIS WILL BE USED IN GIVING POINTS 2. NO, THIS WILL NOT BE USED IN GIVING POINTS 3. I DON,T KNOW WHAT THE ARMY PLANS TO DO 0. NO ANSWER
Q.23F. OTHER DEPENDENTS*  1. YES, THIS WILL BE USED IN GIVING POINTS 2. NO, THIS WILL NOT BE USED IN GIVING POINTS 3. I DON,T KNOW WHAT THE ARMY PLANS TO DO 0. NO ANSWER
Q.23G. AGE*  1. YES, THIS WILL BE USED IN GIVING POINTS 2. NO, THIS WILL NOT BE USED IN GIVING POINTS 3. I DON,T KNOW WHAT THE ARMY PLANS TO DO 0. NO ANSWER
Q.23H. TOTAL NUMBER OF CAMPAIGN STARS*  1. YES, THIS WILL BE USED IN GIVING POINTS 2. NO, THIS WILL NOT BE USED IN GIVING POINTS 3. I DON,T KNOW WHAT THE ARMY PLANS TO DO 0. NO ANSWER
Q.23I. COMBAT INFANTRYMAN,S BADGE*  1. YES, THIS WILL BE USED IN GIVING POINTS 2. NO, THIS WILL NOT BE USED IN GIVING POINTS 3. I DON,T KNOW WHAT THE ARMY PLANS TO DO 0. NO ANSWER
Q.23J. PURPLE HEART*  1. YES, THIS WILL BE USED IN GIVING POINTS 2. NO, THIS WILL NOT BE USED IN GIVING POINTS 3. I DON,T KNOW WHAT THE ARMY PLANS TO DO 0. NO ANSWER

Q.23K. OTHER AWARDS AND DECORATIONS (BRONZE STAR, SILVER STAR, DSC, ETC.)*  1. YES, THIS WILL BE USED IN GIVING POINTS 2. NO, THIS WILL NOT BE USED IN GIVING POINTS 3. I DON,T KNOW WHAT THE ARMY PLANS TO DO 0. NO ANSWER

Q.24. FROM WHAT YOU KNOW OF THE PLAN, DO MEN NOW IN THE PACIFIC FIGHTING AGAINST THE JAPS GET POINT SCORES AND A CHANCE TO GET OUT OF THE ARMY*  1. YES, THE ARMY PLANS TO INCLUDE MEN NOW IN THE PACIFIC IN THE POINT SYSTEM 2. NO, THE ARMY DOES NOT PLAN TO INCLUDE MEN NOW IN THE PACIFIC IN THE POINT SYSTEM 3. I DON,T KNOW WHAT THE ARMY PLANS TO DO ABOUT THIS 0. NO ANSWER

Q.25. SUPPOSE AN OUTFIT NOW IN EUROPE IS GOING TO BE SENT TO FIGHT THE JAPS. WHAT WILL HAPPEN TO MEN IN THE OUTFIT WHO ARE ELIGIBLE TO BE LET OUT BECAUSE THEY HAVE THE HIGHEST POINT SCORES*  1. THE ARMY PLANS TO SEND THEM TO THE PACIFIC ALONG WITH THEIR OUTFIT 2. THE ARMY PLANS TO REPLACE THEM IF POSSIBLE BEFORE THEIR OUTFIT GOES TO THE PACIFIC 3. I DON,T KNOW WHAT THE ARMY PLANS TO DO ABOUT THIS 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.26. WHAT ABOUT AMERICAN SOLDIERS IN EUROPE WHO ARE ELIGIBLE TO BE LET OUT OF THE ARMY BECAUSE THEY HAVE THE HIGHEST POINT SCORES AND THEREFORE ARE TO BE SENT BACK TO THE STATES. WILL MOST OF THEM BE SENT BACK TO THE U.S. WITHIN THE NEXT 3 MONTHS*  1. YES, MOST OF THEM WILL BE SENT TO THE U.S. WITHIN THE NEXT 3 MONTHS 2. NO, MOST OF THEM WILL HAVE TO WAIT MORE THAN 3 MONTHS 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA P. NOW, HERE ARE SOME MORE QUESTIONS ABOUT THE PLAN. REMEMBER THAT IN THESE QUESTIONS WE ARE NOT ASKING YOU WHAT THINGS YOU THINK SHOULD COUNT. WE SIMPLY WANT TO FIND OUT WHETHER MOST SOLDIERS KNOW THE CORRECT FACTS ABOUT WHAT THE ARMY PLANS TO DO. YOUR ANSWERS SHOULD TELL WHICH MEN ON THE AVERAGE ARE MORE LIKELY TO BE LET OUT FIRST. IF YOU ARE NOT SURE, YOU SHOULD CHECK "I DON,T KNOW WHAT THE ARMY PLANS TO DO".

Q.27A. WHICH OF THESE TWO TYPES OF MEN IS MORE LIKELY TO BE LET OUT FIRST UNDER THE ARMY PLAN (THE POINT SYSTEM) - IF THEY ARE EXACTLY THE SAME IN EVERY OTHER WAY*  1. A MAN WITH ONE CHILD UNDER 18 YEARS OF AGE 2. A MAN WITH TWO CHILDREN UNDER 18 YEARS OF AGE 3. BOTH HAVE THE SAME CHANCE 4. I DON,T KNOW WHAT THE ARMY PLANS TO DO 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

A MARRIED MAN WITH NO CHILDREN 3. BOTH HAVE THE SAME CHANCE 4. I DON,T KNOW WHAT THE ARMY PLANS TO DO 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

NO CODE OR NO DATA

A SINGLE MAN, 33 YEARS OLD 3. BOTH HAVE THE SAME CHANCE 4. I DON,T KNOW WHAT THE ARMY PLANS TO DO 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

A MAN WITH 24 MONTHS SERVICE, OF WHICH 12 MONTHS WERE OVERSEAS 2. A MAN WITH 24 MONTHS SERVICE, OF WHICH 6 MONTHS WERE OVERSEAS 3. BOTH HAVE THE SAME CHANCE 4. I DON,T KNOW WHAT THE ARMY PLANS TO DO 0. NO ANSWER

Q.27F. WHICH OF THESE TWO TYPES OF MEN IS MORE LIKELY TO BE LET OUT FIRST UNDER THE ARMY PLAN (THE POINT SYSTEM) - IF THEY ARE EXACTLY THE SAME IN EVERY OTHER WAY*  1. A MAN WHO HAS 180 DAYS OF COMBAT AND 2 CAMPAIGN STARS 2. A MAN WHO HAS 90 DAYS OF COMBAT AND 2 CAMPAIGN STARS 3. BOTH HAVE THE SAME CHANCE 4. I DON,T KNOW WHAT THE ARMY PLANS TO DO 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.27G. WHICH OF THESE TWO TYPES OF MEN IS MORE LIKELY TO BE LET OUT FIRST UNDER THE ARMY PLAN (THE POINT SYSTEM) - IF THEY ARE EXACTLY THE SAME IN EVERY OTHER WAY*  1. A MAN WITH TWO CAMPAIGN STARS 2. A MAN WITH ONE CAMPAIGN STAR AND THE SILVER STAR 3. BOTH HAVE THE SAME CHANCE 4. I DON,T KNOW WHAT THE ARMY PLANS TO DO 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.28. HOW MANY AMERICAN SOLDIERS WHO ARE NOW IN EUROPE DO YOU THINK WILL BE SENT TO FIGHT AGAINST THE JAPS*  1. ALMOST ALL OF THEM 2. MOST OF THEM 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM 4. ONLY A FEW OF THEM 5. ALMOST NONE OF THEM 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.29. SUPPOSE AN OUTFIT IS SHIPPED FROM EUROPE TO THE PACIFIC BEFORE THERE IS TIME TO REPLACE THE MEN WHO ARE ELIGIBLE TO BE LET OUT BECAUSE THEY HAVE THE HIGHEST POINT SCORES. AS FAR AS YOU KNOW, WHAT DOES THE ARMY PLAN TO DO ABOUT THESE MEN WITH VERY HIGH POINT SCORES WHO HAPPEN TO BE SENT TO THE PACIFIC WITH THEIR OUTFIT*  1. THEY WILL HAVE TO STAY IN THE PACIFIC WITH THEIR OUTFIT 2. THEY WILL HAVE TO STAY IN THE PACIFIC BUT WILL BE TRANSFERRED TO NON-COMBAT OUTFITS 3. THEY WILL BE REPLACED AND SENT BACK TO THE STATES AS SOON AS POSSIBLE 4. I DON,T KNOW WHAT THE ARMY PLANS TO DO ABOUT THIS 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.30A. NOT COUNTING MEDICAL DISCHARGES, HOW MANY SOLDIERS DO YOU THINK WILL BE LET OUT OF THE ARMY DURING THE NEXT SIX MONTHS*  1. ALMOST NONE 2. A FAIRLY SMALL NUMBER 3. A FAIRLY LARGE NUMBER 4. A VERY LARGE NUMBER 0. NO ANSWER

Q.30B. THERE ARE NOW ABOUT EIGHT MILLION MEN IN THE AMERICAN ARMY. NOT COUNTING MEDICAL DISCHARGES, HOW MANY SOLDIERS DO YOU THINK WILL BE LET OUT OF THE ARMY DURING THE NEXT SIX MONTHS*  1. PRACTICALLY NONE WILL BE LET OUT 2. LESS THAN ONE-HALF MILLION WILL BE LET OUT 3. ONE-HALF TO ONE MILLION WILL BE LET OUT 4. ONE TO TWO MILLION WILL BE LET OUT 5. TWO TO FOUR MILLION WILL BE LET OUT 6. OVER FOUR MILLION WILL BE LET OUT 7. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA P. THE NEXT QUESTIONS ASK FOR YOUR OWN PERSONAL OPINION. THERE ARE NO RIGHT OR WRONG ANSWERS TO THESE QUESTIONS. SOME PEOPLE BELIEVE ONE WAY AND SOME ANOTHER WAY. SO YOUR ANSWERS SHOULD SHOW WHAT YOUR OWN OPINION IS.

Q.31. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT WHAT YOU,VE DONE IN THIS WAR*  1. I FEEL I,VE DONE MY SHARE AS A SOLDIER AND SHOULD BE DISCHARGED 2. I FEEL I,VE ALREADY DONE MY SHARE, BUT I,M READY TO DO MORE 3. I DON,T FEEL I,VE DONE MY SHARE YET 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.32. UNDER THE ARMY SCORE CARD PLAN, SOME MEN WILL BE RETURNED TO THE STATES BECAUSE THEY HAVE THE HIGHEST POINT SCORES AND THEREFORE WILL BE FIRST IN TURN TO GET OUT OF THE ARMY. HOW MANY OF THESE MEN WHO ARE FIRST IN TURN TO GET OUT OF THE ARMY DO YOU THINK REALLY WILL BE LET OUT SOON AFTER THEY GET BACK TO THE U.S.*  1. ALMOST ALL OF THEM WILL BE LET OUT 2. MOST OF THEM WILL BE LET OUT 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM WILL BE LET OUT 4. ONLY A FEW OF THEM WILL BE LET OUT 5. ALMOST NONE OF THEM WILL BE LET OUT 0. NO ANSWER

Q.33. IN GENERAL, WHAT DO YOU THINK OF THE ARMY SCORE CARD PLAN (THE POINT SYSTEM)*  1. IT IS VERY GOOD 2. IT IS FAIRLY GOOD 3. IT IS NOT SO GOOD 4. IT IS NOT GOOD AT ALL 5. I DON,T KNOW ENOUGH ABOUT IT TO SAY 0. NO ANSWER

YES, I THINK IT WILL BE CARRIED OUT THE WAY IT IS SUPPOSED TO BE 2. NO, I DON,T THINK IT WILL BE CARRIED OUT THE WAY IT IS SUPPOSED TO BE 3. I DON,T KNOW ENOUGH ABOUT THE PLAN TO SAY 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
